Container.Name: Mango
Container.Overview: Mango is a self-hosted manga server and reader. Its features include[br] - Multi-user support[br] - OPDS support[br] - Dark/light mode switch[br] - Supported formats: .cbz, .zip, .cbr and .rar[br] - Supports nested folders in library[br] - Automatically stores reading progress[br] - Built-in MangaDex downloader[br] - The web reader is responsive and works well on mobile, so there is no need for a mobile app[br]
